Text:
Yeah thats nice, but when the videos finally arrive after hours of waiting they are mostly from Logitec ÂŠ 2002 model webcam. None of the 20 I have seen so far look anything like the screenshot picture. 

Many of the vids are starring your grandma bazwela, I'm sure of it...

Sacred, your comment made me laugh! Well, I cannot confirm or deny that my grandma is in any or many of these vids, but I can confirm that many of the vids are taken with easily available equipment and not high-end gear.  You must be mistaking the "amateur" part with professional.
This is the slowest download I've ever tried.  Right now it's going to take over a year to finish at the rate it's being seeded.
